name: Jauth
body: ### Welcome to JAuth JAuth is a reference desktop client for the google authenticator. Intended as an alternative to the iPhone Google Authenticator app and similar. For a little background see this explanatory bloggage ### Installers Windows 1.0 OS X 1.0 Unix 1.0 ### Authors and Contributors @mclamp and James Cuff (james_cuff@harvard.edu) put together the main package. Many thanks to John Brunelle (john_brunelle@harvard.edu) and everyone else in Harvard's Research Computing group for their work incorporating JAuth into their authentication system. Additional thanks for contributions from @bookest and @grimneko and suggestions from @agoddard Much of the heavy lifting algorithmic work was originally done by sweis@google.com Please see the README for all acknowledgements and thanks.
tagline: Java GUI client to generate Google authentication codes
note: Don't delete this file! It's used internally to help with page regeneration.
